title: Quick login buttons are not duplicated or ambiguous on Home
description: Verifies that the home page shows distinct, clearly labeled quick login options for student and teacher.

steps.description: Verify text "Login with Google" is visible

title: Student onboarding: select "Quiero Aprender" and reach Student Dashboard
description: Verifies a logged-in new user can choose the student role and is redirected to the student dashboard.

title: Teacher onboarding: select "Quiero Ense単ar" and reach Teacher Dashboard
description: Verifies a logged-in new user can choose the teacher role and is redirected to the teacher dashboard.

title: Onboarding page loads and shows both role options
description: Verifies the onboarding screen renders the expected role selection UI for an authenticated user.

title: Onboarding requires selecting a role before confirming
description: Verifies the user cannot proceed when no role is selected and receives visible guidance or remains on onboarding.

title: Role selection can be changed before confirming
description: Verifies the user can switch between roles before confirming and still successfully completes onboarding.

title: View teacher listing cards on Home marketplace
description: Verifies the landing page loads and shows teacher cards with key summary information.

title: Open a teacher from the marketplace listing
description: Verifies a user can click a teacher card and reach a detail view or a contact call-to-action.

title: Filter teachers by specialty (results update)
description: Verifies selecting a specialty filter updates the visible teacher results.

title: Filter teachers by price range (results update)
description: Verifies applying a price filter changes the teacher cards shown.

title: Combine multiple filters and verify results refresh
description: Verifies using more than one filter at once updates the listing accordingly.

title: Clear filters and return to unfiltered teacher list
description: Verifies that filters can be cleared and the full teacher list returns.

title: Apply filters that return no matches and see empty state
description: Verifies the marketplace shows an empty state when filters yield no results.

steps.description: Verify text "No teachers found" is visible
Verify text "Try broadening your search" is visible

title: Empty-state recovery by broadening search (clear or loosen filters)
description: Verifies a user can recover from an empty state by adjusting filters and seeing results return.

steps.description: Verify text "No teachers found" is visible

title: Join classroom and see chessboard loaded (without relying on AV permissions)

title: Verify classroom page has LiveKit controls visible (UI readiness)
description: Verifies the classroom renders the expected AV control UI elements even if AV cannot connect.

steps.description: Click on any visible "Start lesson", "Enter room", or "Classroom" button/link for a listed teacher

title: Make a legal opening move and see it applied locally
description: Verifies a user can make a valid chess move and the board updates to the new position.

Click the white pawn on e2

title: Reject an illegal move and restore the original position
description: Verifies illegal moves are rejected and the piece returns to its original square.

Click the white king on e1
Verify the white king is visible on e1

title: Send a chat message to a teacher and see it appear in the thread
description: Verifies that a logged-in user can send a message and immediately see it in the chat window.

steps.description: Click on a teacher card in the teacher listing
Click the "Chat" button or link for the selected teacher
Type "Hello! Are you available for a lesson this week?" into the message input field
Verify text "Hello! Are you available for a lesson this week?" is visible

title: Attempt to send an empty message and confirm it is not sent
description: Verifies the chat input validation prevents sending blank messages.

steps.description: Click on a teacher card in the teacher listing
Click the "Chat" button or link for the selected teacher

title: Send message by pressing Enter and see it appear
description: Verifies that pressing Enter submits the message if supported by the UI.

steps.description: Click on a teacher card in the teacher listing
Click the "Chat" button or link for the selected teacher
Type "Can we reschedule to Friday?" into the message input field
Verify text "Can we reschedule to Friday?" is visible

title: Chat UI remains usable after a send attempt (input clears or stays consistent)
description: Verifies the message input state behaves predictably after sending (clears or remains editable) and the user can continue typing.

steps.description: Click on a teacher card in the teacher listing
Click the "Chat" button or link for the selected teacher
Type "First message" into the message input field
Type "Second message" into the message input field
